name: feint
description: A game engine for crafting 2D games in Haxe
author: Kenny Goff

scripts.docs: haxe docs.hxml && haxelib run dox -i docs -o docs/pages -in "^feint."
scripts.docs:watch: yarn docs && fswatch -o src | xargs -n1 -I{} yarn docs
scripts.sandbox:watch: haxe sandbox.build.hxml && fswatch -o src sandbox/src | xargs -n1 -I{} haxe sandbox.build.hxml
